Summary: Faint yet noticable timed boom sounds like artillery rounds hitting ground, which is wierd because traffic noise ussually drowns out any other noises besides jets going to Detroit metro airport n Romulus.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around December 17th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsNot necessarily a sighting. Every Saturday at 9:40 or so it sounds like timed bombs going off. Last my Mother said do u hear that Isaid yes as soon as she said that it made what sounded like thunder then it it stopped as if they heard us talking about it. very faint boom noise can be heard over everything ur doing, yet very faint and timed. It wigs me out.
